transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Yes, ji sir?
Executive: Ha, mam, ye hai na, mera pehle base plan chal raha tha to kuch din pehle TrustSeal ke liye payment kiya tha to wo main puchna chah raha hu ki mere account mein TrustSeal active hai ya nahi hai?
Executive: Ek second main check kar leti hu.
Executive: Sir, aapki na aaj hi jo services hai abhi live hui hai, thik hai? TrustSeal ki services abhi active ho gayi hai aapki. Aapke paas na I think aaj sham tak ek KYC ke liye call aayega, thik hai? Verification karana padega TrustSeal ke liye verification team aapko call karegi, thik hai? Wo verified jaise hi ho jayega aapka TrustSeal live ho jayega hamari site ke sath.
Customer: Aur mam agar main jo mera base plan hai wo usme kitne din left hai mam abhi?
Executive: Ek second.
Executive: Sir, ye isme pura adjust ho gaya hai. Abhi aapka jo chalega services main bata deti hu. Wo 10 November 2026 tak aapki services chalengi TrustSeal one year ki.
Customer: Nahi mam, jo main uski puch raha puch raha hu jo mera pichla plan tha na wo khatam ho chuka hai ya phir abhi kuch din baki hai usme?
Executive: Nahi nahi sir wo khatam ho gaya hai. TrustSeal services aapne jo payment kiya tha wo Friday ko payment kiya tha, right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Right, thik hai. To sir jab se payment karte hai tab se aapki jo start date hai nahi start hoti hai. Aapki services jab se live hongi aapki jo services ki date start hogi wo usi din se hogi. Aaj se aapki services live ho rahi hai sir to aaj se aapki date start hogi aapki jo agle saal 10 November tak valid rahegi.
Customer: Okay mam to agar main is plan ko kuch din 15 ya 20 din baad start karna chahu to ye possible hai?
Executive: Nahi nahi sir wo possible nahi hai sir.
Executive: Amount aapka already services live ho chuki hai sir.
Customer: Ha, thik hai, thik hai, thik hai mam. Kya issue aa raha hai bataiye aap.
Customer: Abhi mam thoda stock out hai mere paas aur wo thoda ghar pe bhi isi liye se to to main use sambhal nahi paunga isliye main soch raha hu kuch din baad se 10-15 din baad se start karu.
Executive: Sir but services to aapki already live ho chuki hai aaj.
Customer: Ye TrustSeal wali?
Executive: Yes right.
Customer: To wo KYC ke liye phir kya bataye?
Executive: KYC ke liye sir wo verification hota hai wo verification hoga aapka aaj. Aapka matlab company ka jo signboard hota hai wo check karenge invoice wagera sab video call pe check karte hai KYC team jo hoti hai hamari. Wo verification aapko ek bar karana padega sir. Kyunki services aapki live ho chuki hai.
Customer: To matlab live ho gayi hai?
Executive: Ji? Services live ho gayi hai. Aur aap check karoge na bylead ka bylead bhi sir aapko allocate kar di gayi hai aap check kar sakte ho apni site pe. Bylead bhi TrustSeal ke jo 34 bylead aapko milti hai. Hmm. Thik hai? Wo weekly bylead aapko mil gayi hai aur daily bonus bylead aapko daily basis pe milti rahengi. Ha aur uske liye jo manager allot hoga mam wo kuch abhi tak mere paas nahi aaya hai call abhi tak. Sir aapke abhi recent jo account manager hai Tauheed hai unse kuch issue hai bataiye mujhe?
Customer: Nahi nahi issue kuch nahi hai mam but kya hai ab wo wahi continue rahenge ya phir change bhi hoga? Abhi sir wahi rahenge aapko change karana hai to aap mujhe bataiye agar Tauheed se kuch problem aa raha hai to. Nahi nahi nahi change ab matlab aisi koi problem nahi hai.
Hmm.
Customer: To thik hai mam.
Executive: Agar aap chahe to sir aapke account manager change karne ke liye hum request raise kar sakte hai agar koi issue aa raha hai aapko aapke account manager ke sath. Aisi koi jarurat nahi hai abhi. Thik hai. Koi problem nahi hai main ek bar Tauheed ko bol deti hu wo bhi aapse ek bar connect kar lenge, thik hai?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Thik hai, thank you. Thank you so much ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know if TrustSeal is active.

- Enquired about the remaining days of base plan.

- Wants to postpone TrustSeal activation for few days.

- Has not received a call from account manager.



Resolution:

- Informed TrustSeal services are now active.

- Informed about KYC verification call.

- Informed services will run till November 10, 2026.

- Clarified TrustSeal validity starts from activation date.

- Explained KYC verification process.

- Informed buyleads have been allocated.

- Offered to change account manager if needed.

- Executive will inform Tauheed to connect with customer.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Executive will inform Tauheed to connect.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, kyc, buyleads, account manager
